List of years in Belgium

This article lists some of the events that took place in Belgium in 2006.

  • 1 Incumbents
  • 2 Events

Incumbents[edit]

  • Monarch: Albert II
  • Prime Minister: Guy Verhofstadt

Events[edit]

This section needs expansion. You can help by adding to it. (December 2014)
  • March 22-26, the 2006 World University Cycling Championship takes place in Antwerp/Herentals
    • The Netherlands wins the overall medal table. Ellen van Dijk is the best cyclist with 1 gold and 1 silver medal.
